name: Cunami WEB Group
slogan: Seeking partner for Sales on UK

team.name: Cunami Group
team.bioHtml: WE MAKE IDEAS HAPPEN! The company is able to provide all the necessary IT services in one place, saving your time and money.

jobs.title: Sales Manager/Co-Founder
jobs.description:
Do you want to work for a company where you will be a Sales Manager but eventually become a CO-Founder? Where you will be able to express, prove yourself and earn more for each project! If you are passionate about the IT industry and you know it is your natural calling. Then join us!



Cunami WEB Group LTD is a new London based branch for Latvian IT company providing a full range of IT services. The company can provide all the necessary IT services in one place, saving you time and money.



Our requirements:


Experience in SALES and attraction of new clients

Management of the contracting process

Preparation of project documentation

Ability to work independently, flexible

Be ready-made solutions

Skilled in working with a client

To be an outstanding lead negotiator in the interests of the Cunami WEB Group LTD.

We offer:


Opportunity to participate in innovative IT direction and option to become CO-founder

Experiment with creative ideas and initiate new processes

Competitive pay

Flexible working hours

Friendly staff


! Experience in E-Commerce field will be considered as an advantage.


Please send your CV.

Share job
